column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I have nothing but great things to say about the Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba staff - from the planning and responsiveness ahead of time to the service the actual day of - they really put my mind at ease when coordinating a party of 15 or so people. Â I had a ton of questions beforehand and their event team answered each and every one of them within hours from when I sent them an email.
